title: Looking for typeface using thin ornate lines...like tourette
content:
Hi everyone,

I’m looking for typefaces with a similar feel to Virus fonts [“tourette”](http://web.archive.org/web/20070824231802/http:/virusfonts.com/spec%20sheets/tourette.html). Namely, typefaces that use long, thin lines with a sort of ornate or disturbing quality. I’m quite confident I’m going to have to create a custom font for this project but I could use some inspiration!

Thanks!

 [‹ Type and design on website](http://web.archive.org/web/20070824231802/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33701 "Go to previous forum topic") [Curse of the Typophile ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070824231802/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34951 "Go to next forum topic")
author: toog

comments.content:
You won’t get much thinner and ornate  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/emigre/missionary/](http://web.archive.org/web/20070824231802/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emigre/missionary/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/emigre/missionary/")

Tim
Thanks guys! I didn’t know typophile was back up. I really like Restraint!
